snippet: The annual open enrollment period for Medicare begins Thursday, and if you buy a stand-alone prescription drug plan, health experts say you should review your policy and compare options.

keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The annual open enrollment period for Medicare begins Thursday, and if you buy a stand-alone prescription drug plan, health experts say you should review your policy and compare options.

headline.main: Check Your Medicare Prescription Drug Plan, Then Check It Again
